headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Down as Franklin and Lamar to Get Double Rewards
content:
Play as Franklin and Lamar and survive a relentless assault in cramped quarters or join the other side of the attack to try and take down the heavily armed duo. Double Down is paying out Double Rewards to all comers through March 30.

To launch Double Down, head to the Online tab in the Pause Menu. Locate Rockstar Created and discover Double Down maps in the Adversary Mode menu list.
